articles.title: Here’s what you missed at Turning Point’s chaotic convention - AP News
articles.description: Turning Point USA's AmericaFest convention has been marked by internal feuds among conservative figures. Erika Kirk, leading the organization since her husband Charlie's assassination, likened the event to a family dinner with heated discussions. Key conserva…
articles.content:
PHOENIX (AP) When Turning Point USAs annual AmericaFest convention reached its halfway point, Erika Kirk tried to put a smiling face on things.

articles.title: U.S. conducts strikes on ISIS targets in Syria in retaliation for killing of American soldiers - Axios
articles.description: Operation "Hawkeye Strike" is the most wide-ranging U.S. military operation against ISIS in Syria in several years.
articles.content:
